    • Method Detail

      • onStartFrame

        public void onStartFrame(List<Bulb> bulbs,
                         long timestamp)
        Description copied from class: AbstractBaseAnimationStrategy
        The framework will present the animation as a sequence of frames and at the beginning of each frame, this method is called. You can use it to do some calculations that will have value for the whole frame. If you create a dynamic model of some sort in this method, please be a good citizen and destroy it in #onEndFrame.
        Specified by:
        onStartFrame in interface AnimationStrategy
        Overrides:
        onStartFrame in class AbstractBaseAnimationStrategy
        Parameters:
        bulbs - The list of all bulbs gives you the number of them as well as the position and color of each one.
        timestamp - Provides a view at the clock ( System.currentTimeMillis() ) is a consistant way.

      • getStrategyName

        public String getStrategyName()
        Description copied from interface: AnimationStrategy
        To process many animations by many participants we need to automate to later provide tables of data and rankings. The name of your strategy/animation will be published, so please be polite. Otherwise you'll risk disqualification.
        Returns:
        The name you are giving your animation.

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()
        Description copied from interface: AnimationStrategy
        To process many animations by many participants we need to automate. The description of your strategy/animation will be read out, when the ranking takes place. Please be polite, otherwise you'll risk disqualification.
        Returns:
        The description you provide to viewers of what they are about to see.

      • getAuthorName

        public String getAuthorName()
        Description copied from interface: AnimationStrategy
        Who is the brilliant person that implemented this beautiful animation? We need to know. Especially during the ranking process and to contact winners.
        Returns:
        Your Name

      • getAuthorEmail

        public String getAuthorEmail()
        Description copied from interface: AnimationStrategy
        During development you can send in animations. We may look at them, check some criteria and use it to harden our framework. In case we need to contact you, this is the way we will do that. So please use a valid address. We won't give it away or store it somewhere else.
        Returns:
        An email address where we can reach you. We won't give it away or store it somewhere else.

      • calcBulb

        protected void calcBulb(Bulb bulb,
                        long timestamp)
        Description copied from class: AbstractBaseAnimationStrategy
        This method is the essence of most animations. It determines the rgb color of the bulb depending on:
        • time
        • 3D position (x,y,z)
        • index (position in the sequence of bulbs)
        • old rgb color
        What a dry, mathematical way of looking at all your amazing animations. Sorry about that.
        Specified by:
        calcBulb in class AbstractBaseAnimationStrategy
